AE551F1D1A3944DE824AB76592210089.description: Develop and/or revise personal and career goals based on the work placement experience.

BB164AC4949C4691A99362F58D07B756.description: In appreciation prepare a letter, note, card or other communication for the work placement employer.

938841EFA9A9486FBCF4FE9A5292865B.description: Update personal career documentation (e.g., resume, portfolio) following the work placement.

3BD487761DE14929B2399817FA3965B3.description: Reflect on the attainment of personal and learning goals.

5E8B4976F7824F479892204BE0D8A04C.description: Showcase one’s skills and abilities demonstrated during the work placement using artifacts, evidence of skill development and personal reflections on aspects of the work experience such as: hours worked; responsibilities and tasks performed; the importance of attitude towards work and taking responsibility for what needs to be done; details about the entry level wage, salary scales and earning potential; worker rights and responsibilities and the role of the union, if applicable; ownership structure (e.g., corporation, franchise, sole proprietorship, partnership); and, opportunities for advancement at the workplace and elsewhere in the industry.

2ABF9A3895F641F6999C6D874E61019F.description: Relate a work placement experience to personal and career goals.

9B6C2BE4B30B4AD3B96613635E81DB6E.description: Document knowledge and awareness of labour standards, safety, workplace ethics, rights and responsibilities, occupational health and safety and networking observed during the work placement.

4F00ABF85C264850B95B213B40D54618.description: Document one’s experience using electronic and other tools (e.g., vlogs, blogs, log sheets, reflective journals) to summarize and reflect upon items such as: hours of work including breaks; responsibilities and tasks performed; interactions with the employer, staff, customers and others; company or organization’s ‘raison d’être;’ and, skills developed and demonstrated during the work placement that enhance one’s employability.

04642E9CD80D4F2F88D8E9BFE63D5ABD.description: Apply relevant skills and abilities during the work placement experience.

C576CC5DF511406FBD478769E6298852.description: Participate in a work placement experience.

1698B8D3C9D640E38726DCB734A0D305.description: Reflect upon one’s performance during the interview.

CD86E91425FB48D2BEE89ADD7228F25B.description: Participate in an interview with the employer prior to beginning the work placement

86F1CF997006492FA1D4A7F676FECFD7.description: Develop a list of questions that could potentially be asked by the employer/work placement in an interview situation as well as answers to the questions.

0BAB9E4DE01E44EDA180B9CE843225E0.description: Brainstorm a list of questions to ask the employer before beginning the work placement; these may include: What is my schedule of work hours?, Who is my supervisor?, What should I wear?, When will I be provided with safety training?, What potential hazards might I encounter in the work placement?, Where do I find fire extinguishers, first aid kits and emergency assistance?, What type of safety gear am I expected to wear? Is it provided?, What should I do if I get injured or have an accident in the workplace?, How can I contact my health and safety committee or representative?,  Are there any health and safety procedures I should follow?,  Who is the first aid person?, Where are safety notices posted?,  What should I do in case of a fire or emergency?

73CDCAAADAB245A997A11BB5C2AFDB01.description: Compile an employer information package that includes documents needed for the work placement (e.g., personal career documentation such as a resume or portfolio, permission forms, logs, self- and employer evaluation forms).

29F861035516443D971BDCDB887CCF96.description: Develop a procedural guide for the work placement that includes items such as: transportation to and from the work placement; hours of work; guidelines for absence and tardiness; dress code; job description; and, conflict resolution

7ED3E60F7461458A881AB6DA6BFCFE19.description: In collaboration with all partners, develop personal and learning goals for the work placement.

98BBF84E1F834C3EB3ABF32FC6DD17A8.description: Research the business/organization to become familiar with its operations.

6CAAB9E0A55344F69354603FF317AE9B.description: Explain the roles and responsibilities of each partner (e.g., student, parent, teacher or other school staff, employer) involved in the work placement.

0280AAAE640F4E7B9FB75B1FEE2E07DE.description: Describe and reflect on the three basic rights that all workers have under Part III – Occupational Act, 2019: the right to know – the hazards at work and how to control them; the right to participate – in finding and controlling workplace hazards; and, the right to refuse – work that you believe is unusually dangerous.

0EC4A42A52C5440996A821436E3275B6.description: Create a persuasive marketing campaign (e.g., revive a fashion piece, new design).

E8ABEFDB2CC3471C8D68E1BF2DA12147.description: Investigate cultural appropriation in fashion marketing.

F9B9D76C6A6942998D3784C06C259441.description: Plan a marketing strategy for a specific target market

26C92980D6884CFB878FC23CF74EC422.description: Investigate marketing practices regarding quality, price, durability of fabrics, brands, trends and fashion cycle.

29929383B184439296295FDFFF53B0F2.description: Examine marketing strategies used by retail stores on specific clientele (e.g., youth, women, men, children).

4EB204D2CE78425FA8F48C35914D0706.description: Analyze the demographic and psychologic rationale for target marketing.

CFD96E31827C4494A52810E6464AA511.description: Investigate marketing practices in the fashion industry.

C00C8BA0334741AC864E4B20C7047A39.description: Construct a project using a created pattern.

26BF9154669D40058BD3B67065C14A4B.description: Design a sewing pattern using a computer program incorporating required elements (i.e., design details, required pattern information, pattern layout).

F7AE913FDF75440AADE668D5F2EDE969.description: Design a flat pattern from a set of measurements.

676649BA8D604BBA98B563394F4D7F67.description: Explore and apply flat pattern design techniques using a commercial pattern.

429F27836320452DBFE54FE22B896B58.description: Design a fashion illustration as the basis for pattern creation.

147E360A5A294131A534386FF4F7B120.description: Identify the tools (e.g., French curve, awl, notcher, tracing wheel) and terminology (e.g., ease, grading, blending, truing) needed in pattern design.

56B8951B51B3469E90127FBF2C424376.description: Identify the methods of designing a sewing pattern (i.e., flat draft patterns, draping, computer aided design).

65F6D379689745B0BA9D4C53A428C553.description: Create a sewing pattern based on a fashion design.

A37A035473E1409493D93A3193CF71D1.description: Practise pressing during project construction (e.g., collars, cuffs, interfacing).

50C50F27BD5B412A860B6522F3A275B6.description: Demonstrate a variety of advanced construction details (e.g., pleats, collars, cuffs, interfacing, matching plaids or checks) in the creation of a sewing project.

803CA506952E4DF3A4630741A869DFC2.description: Demonstrate a variety of advanced sewing techniques such as stay stitching and under stitching in the creation of a sewing project.

DCAB7790672B4AE08A1DC196CD4E2F12.description: Practise advanced seam finishes (e.g., edge stitching).

019C19AB1815498C94EA9F7E07073AD7.description: Practise sewing advanced seams (e.g., welt seam, double-stitched seam, three-thread serging).

6B96B0533A814DC08E7692429B61A677.description: Demonstrate advanced sewing techniques and construction details.

4047D3BDFCC74658BF87B4938873FF88.description: Apply advanced sewing techniques (e.g., lining, fasteners, collars and facings) to incorporate in the project.

566F2DFD36F0492BBFD61744E316239D.description: Demonstrate the use construction details (e.g., gathers, darts, topstitching, variety of seams, embellishments).

8472EC7E917F42099C6A13E5A1BB5743.description: Produce a project plan, including pattern selection, fabric selection, time, budget and skill level.

15BFA9D39D7344379BF8313873050D87.description: Examine textiles suitable for the project (e.g., leather, napped, rayon, silk, fur).

3DD4CA9252BB41A0AA13856B9CF7FFD8.description: Conduct an inquiry into resources (e.g., expenses, time management) to complete the project independently.

6B21567C692943299DBADE4A48EE5D0C.description: Construct a project from a pattern or instructions.

4E57525B11E646888FE6E1AD994BDF9C.description: Construct an item (e.g., re-usable sandwich bags, cosmetic pads, food wraps and covers, totes and bags) that promotes waste and plastic reduction by replacing a single use item.

36473104B5D341B486C1642962A03819.description: Discuss alternate ways of acquiring clothing such as thrifting, clothing swaps, rentals, altering and creating.

A8294BD664B34601AD4128D7B7056366.description: Analyze how clothing fulfils physical, psychological, social and aesthetic needs.

B027200BAD014B79AB6D4BE2B8EE900C.description: Evaluate the life cycle of a garment with consideration to resources (e.g., environmental sustainability, natural/manmade materials) used.

093920988E4F42068E9927203D91B3FB.description: Create an item that promotes waste reduction.

6E13D2FA766D4F36B4F43D9FC44031ED.description: Investigate how changes in fashion trends influence the consumer (e.g., spending habits, mental well-being, social status).

E55B37809C8849B3BE7F0914FE6EDDD2.description: Conduct an inquiry into how fashion could cause oppression of people’s body shapes and sizes and contribute to eating disorders and use of diets.

0DD254E421B34B289434D347D3CD5850.description: Investigate subliminal messages in fashion advertising and clothing.

DBF491964D494170B96A531D4D4087FC.description: Analyze significant fashion characteristics from a specific historical period (e.g., Early Renaissance, Victorian, Roaring 20s, 1960s) and their influences on present day fashion.

89E406A6837C4C98B0D0AACF025BD40F.description: Investigate ethical issues around cultural appropriation in past and present clothing and accessories fashion trends.

6F2FCDE1FED44042917A2175C1572D75.description: Examine the influences of fast fashion (i.e., inexpensive mass market clothing) in relation to one’s ethical conscious

D7626BE3FDCF4A7D87E71FD9E7878AAD.description: Investigate major events or factors in history and their influences on fashion trends (e.g., world wars, evolving roles of women).

77DEB2498350458387E6A2677D2DD57B.description: Conduct an inquiry of influential designers and their companies at a local, national or global scale

D0B19FABC9FD4FDF85777D8187B50FA0.description: Examine cultural influences (e.g., First Nations and Métis, African, Asian) on Western fashion designs.

50CCDCFEE6644EF3B84FCFCA3170434E.description: Analyze trend forecasting and how it affects what will be available to consumers.

325D876C9CA24D57A4DB9B2989170AC6.description: Investigate the evolution of clothing fashion.

304652DD4B904ED0968FB7BD6663AEF6.description: Construct a quilt using advanced techniques (e.g., block assembly, pressing techniques, row assembly, layering of batting, pinning, stitch in the ditch).

3447CBD5267E42969C12101CAD91EACA.description: Practise quilt finishing techniques (e.g., bias binding and attachment).

F8ABF239B767408E827EFE80F23F8BB1.description: Apply knowledge of quilt pattern construction (e.g., cutting of fabric, sewing of various widths of boarder(s), sub-cutting) to advanced quilt creation.

91C5FFF64C9F4824911B26F3DED98E8B.description: Demonstrate knowledge of the quilt pattern and cutting of fabric (e.g., cutting, notions, fabric and fabric amounts).

254C16E35BFF4A24AEB17FCC113AA67E.description: Select a pattern (e.g., log cabin, pattern with diagonal block) for use.

29A930048E954C2DB6240BFA2911EBAB.description: Create a quilt using advanced quilting techniques.
